description: This is an example of how to use i18next in React.
This_is_where_your_ideas: This is where your ideas find value and your dreams grow
on_board_desc: The adventure starts here, so what will be your role?
on_board_student_1_desc: Embark on a journey to bring your projects to life. Use your creativity to envision and plan the projects you dream of.
on_board_student_2_desc: It's time to gather the support you need from the community. Share your goals, find your supporters, and take your projects one step further.
on_board_student_3_desc: Use the support youâ€™ve gathered to realize your projects and turn a new page in your educational journey. Do everything necessary to make your dreams come true.
on_board_supporter_1_desc: Browse through inspiring student projects and select the ones you want to support. Your support will bring great ideas to life.
on_board_supporter_2_desc: Help students achieve their dreams by providing financial support to the projects you've selected. Play a significant role in their journey to success.
on_board_supporter_3_desc: Observe the impact of your donations. Follow the development of the projects you support and witness the realization of dreams.
